T02D1694:51a-1: de b'i t'a ra ku b'a ky'a de sha n'a ma sto tra /
T02D1694:51a-3: lha mo sgrol ma la sme sngags kyi gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
T02D1694:51a-4: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1694:51a-5: phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'jig rten kun sgrol ma //
T02D1694:51a-6: phyag 'tshal skyabs med phongs pa kun skyob ma //
T02D1694:51a-7: phyag 'tshal yang yang dran pas rjes 'dzin ma //
T02D1694:51a-8: de ring da lta mgon med bdag la skyob //
T02D1694:51a-9: khyod sngon skyob pa rnam gzigs spyan chab las //
T02D1694:51a-10: gang 'khrungs de tshe de ma thag 'di skad //
T02D1694:51a-11: srid gnas gang su 'jigs pas 'jigs 'gyur yod //
T02D1694:51a-12: de kun ngas skyabs zhes gsungs dam bca' dgongs //
T02D1694:51a-13: mkha' ltar thugs zab mkha' 'dra yi //
T02D1694:51a-17: zhal bzhes slu ba ma mdzad cig / khyod nyid rig 'dzin lha tshogs nang //
T02D1694:51a-18: zag med dga' bdes rnam rol bgyid //
T02D1694:51a-19: khyod 'bangs bu ni me nang bsreg / kye kye thogs med mkhyen ldan gzigs //
T02D1694:51a-20: bdag rang gis ni nongs bgyis nas //
T02D1694:51a-21: me chu dgra sogs 'jigs gyur pa'ang //
T02D1694:51a-22: gal te khyod sku rjes dran gyur //
T02D1694:51a-23: skyob mdzad lags na bdag cis min //
T02D1694:51a-24: nyid phyag mchod sbyin bdud rtsi yi //
T02D1694:51a-26: cig car tshim bgyid kho bo mes //
T02D1694:51a-27: lus zhu thig le 'bebs ma lags //
T02D1694:51b-1: mngar bsil grib ma bsil ldan pas //
T02D1694:51b-2: cung zad reg na'ang gdung sel ma //
T02D1694:51b-3: gus ldan bu bdag nyug mi mdzad //
T02D1694:51b-4: thugs rjes brkyang pa'i zhabs g-yas kyi //
T02D1694:51b-5: mtho bong rgyun ba zangs thur 'bebs nas //
T02D1694:51b-6: ngan 'gro'i gnas gsum tshim mdzad na //
T02D1694:51b-7: phongs pa bdag cag gyi nar dor //
T02D1694:51b-8: ting 'dzin g-yon bskum skyil krung gi //
T02D1694:51b-9: gar gyis sa gsum bde mdzad ma //
T02D1694:51b-10: sbrang bu mer bcug kho bo lta //
T02D1694:51b-11: gar stabs rlung gis cis mi bskyod //
T02D1694:51b-12: 'dzum zhal dgyes mas gang gzigs na //
T02D1694:51b-13: phag sdig gdol pa mdze can //
T02D1694:51b-15: lha gzugs sdug mdzes sgyur spyod na //
T02D1694:51b-16: kho bo gcig spyan yul ma gyur //
T02D1694:51b-18: khyod sku sus mthong de don 'grub //
T02D1694:51b-19: don gnyer rtse gcig rjes slob bu //
T02D1694:51b-20: bdag la nyid gzugs ston ma lags //
T02D1694:51b-21: khyod spyan autpala dkyus ring gis //
T02D1694:51b-23: rtag tu nyid kyi gdan gnas dang //
T02D1694:51b-24: ji ltar snang yang mkhyen ma lags //
T02D1694:51b-25: lha snyan mda' ma sgra kun gyi //
T02D1694:51b-26: rjes zhugs yul dus kun rig ma //
T02D1694:51b-27: kho bo nyam thag nga ros 'bod //
T02D1694:51b-28: 'brug sgra brag ri ltar gyur gyi //
T02D1694:51b-29: skyob ma lha yi shangs dran pas //
T02D1694:51b-30: gang+g'a'i bye rgal dri rab bsrung //
T02D1694:51b-31: bdag 'dir mes tshig sha tshil gsur //
T02D1694:51b-32: rgya chen phyogs khyab tshor ma lags //
T02D1694:51b-33: thub chen ma gcig zla ba'i ljags //
T02D1694:51b-34: bung ba'i mchu rtse'i ro mkhyen na //
T02D1694:51b-35: seng ge 'phrog byed mchod sbyin du //
T02D1694:51b-36: ro bro ba la ljags rmongs srid //
T02D1694:51b-37: phra rab rdul brgya'i rdul bye ma //
T02D1694:51b-38: rdo rje'i lus mnga' reg mkhyen ma //
T02D1694:51b-39: sdig rgyal khros pas me lha mchod //
T02D1694:51b-40: mi bzad reg byed cis mi reg / phyogs dus rnam kun thogs med par //
T02D1694:51b-41: ma chags ma 'dres ci dga' yang //
T02D1694:51b-42: mkhyen ma de ring skal ngan bdag /
T02D1694:51b-44: rang gzhan gnyis sdig rang spyod dam //
T02D1694:51b-45: gzhan stobs gzhan dbang gyur de yang //
T02D1694:51b-46: thabs stobs brgya mnga' khyod skyabs mdzad //
T02D1694:51b-47: bdag 'dir nongs pa gang mchis grang //
T02D1694:51b-48: gcig tu gzhan la phan zhugs pas //
T02D1694:52a-2: de dbus kho bo khyod 'bangs bsreg / kye ma yum gcig bdag g-yar tsha //
T02D1694:52a-3: sngon las 'bras bu rjes gcod pa'i //
T02D1694:52a-4: gnas gyur de dang de las kyang //
T02D1694:52a-5: khyod thugs gsung dang sku 'jig bgyid //
T02D1694:52a-6: de las gzhan bdag nyid cir dgongs //
T02D1694:52a-7: kyi hud khyod lha zhabs pad drung //
T02D1694:52a-8: bsil ba'i gnas nas 'bar ba'i mes //
T02D1694:52a-9: mer brtson ji bzhin dmyal mes 'tshed //
T02D1694:52a-10: 'di ci sus khur lags zhes gsung //
T02D1694:52a-11: de bas mgon med mgon gcig ma //
T02D1694:52a-12: khyod thabs thugs rje thogs med des //
T02D1694:52a-13: bdag dang 'gro ba ci dga' yang //
T02D1694:52a-14: mdzad min mdzad srid khyed zhus pas //
T02D1694:52a-16: lus can kun gyi zug rdu dang //
T02D1694:52a-17: nyon mongs sdig las tshig gyur cig / da ni su la re bar bya //
T02D1694:52a-18: kha che'i slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba /
T02D1694:52a-19: mi brgya dang bdun gyis bskor ba la tsandan gyi mes bsregs pa'i tshe /
T02D1694:52a-20: nyid kyi yi dam gyi lha rje btsun ma 'phags
T02D1694:52a-21: ma sgrol ma la smre sngags kyi tshigs su bcad
T02D1694:52a-22: pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1694:52a-23: skad cig yud tsam thang cig la 'phags ma'i phyag nas char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam babs nas /
T02D1694:52a-24: mtsho nang gi padma ltar gyur to zhes grag go //
